verses.verse: Now this is the history of the generations <WH8435> of Esau <WH6215> (that is, <WH123> Edom).

Esau <WH6215> took <WH3947> his wives <WH802> from the daughters <WH1323> of Canaan: <WH3667> Adah <WH5711> the daughter <WH1323> of Elon, <WH356> the Hittite; <WH2850> and Oholibamah <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah, <WH6034> the daughter <WH1323> of Zibeon, <WH6649> the Hivite; <WH2340>
and Basemath, <WH1315> Ishmael <WH3458>'s daughter, <WH1323> sister <WH269> of Nebaioth. <WH5032>
Adah <WH5711> bore <WH3205> to Esau <WH6215> Eliphaz. <WH464> Basemath <WH1315> bore <WH3205> Reuel. <WH7467>

Oholibamah <WH173> bore <WH3205> Jeush, <WH3274> Jalam, <WH3281> and Korah. <WH7141> These are the sons <WH1121> of Esau, <WH6215> who were born <WH3205> to him in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

Esau <WH6215> took <WH3947> his wives, <WH802> his sons, <WH1121> his daughters, <WH1323> and all the members <WH5315> of his household, <WH1004> with his livestock, <WH4735> all his animals, <WH929> and all his possessions, <WH7075> which he had gathered <WH7408> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and went <WH3212> into a land <WH776> away from <WH6440> his brother <WH251> Jacob. <WH3290>

For their substance <WH7399> was too great <WH7227> for them to dwell <WH3427> together, <WH3162> and the land <WH776> of their travels <WH4033> couldn't <WH3201> bear <WH5375> them because <WH6440> of their livestock. <WH4735>
Esau <WH6215> lived <WH3427> in the hill <WH2022> country of Seir. <WH8165> Esau <WH6215> is Edom. <WH123>
This is the history of the generations <WH8435> of Esau <WH6215> the father <WH1> of the Edomites <WH123> in the hill <WH2022> country of Seir: <WH8165>

these are the names <WH8034> of Esau <WH6215>'s sons: <WH1121> Eliphaz, <WH464> the son <WH1121> of Adah, <WH5711> the wife <WH802> of Esau; <WH6215> and Reuel, <WH7467> the son <WH1121> of Basemath, <WH1315> the wife <WH802> of Esau. <WH6215>
The sons <WH1121> of Eliphaz <WH464> were Teman, <WH8487> Omar, <WH201> Zepho, <WH6825> and Gatam, <WH1609> and Kenaz. <WH7073>

Timna <WH8555> was concubine <WH6370> to Eliphaz, <WH464> Esau <WH6215>'s son; <WH1121> and she bore <WH3205> to Eliphaz <WH464> Amalek. <WH6002> These are the sons <WH1121> of Adah, <WH5711> Esau <WH6215>'s wife. <WH802>
These are the sons <WH1121> of Reuel: <WH7467> Nahath, <WH5184> Zerah, <WH2226> Shammah, <WH8048> and Mizzah. <WH4199> These were the sons <WH1121> of Basemath, <WH1315> Esau <WH6215>'s wife. <WH802>

These were the sons <WH1121> of Oholibamah, <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah, <WH6034> the daughter <WH1323> of Zibeon, <WH6649> Esau <WH6215>'s wife: <WH802> she bore <WH3205> to Esau <WH6215> Jeush, <WH3274> Jalam, <WH3281> and Korah. <WH7141>

These are the chiefs <WH441> of the sons <WH1121> of Esau: <WH6215> the sons <WH1121> of Eliphaz <WH464> the firstborn <WH1060> of Esau: <WH6215> chief <WH441> Teman, <WH8487> chief <WH441> Omar, <WH201> chief <WH441> Zepho, <WH6825> chief <WH441> Kenaz, <WH7073>

chief <WH441> Korah, <WH7141> chief <WH441> Gatam, <WH1609> chief <WH441> Amalek: <WH6002> these are the chiefs <WH441> who came of Eliphaz <WH464> in the land <WH776> of Edom; <WH123> these are the sons <WH1121> of Adah. <WH5711>

These are the sons <WH1121> of Reuel, <WH7467> Esau <WH6215>'s son: <WH1121> chief <WH441> Nahath, <WH5184> chief <WH441> Zerah, <WH2226> chief <WH441> Shammah, <WH8048> chief <WH441> Mizzah: <WH4199> these are the chiefs <WH441> who came of Reuel <WH7467> in the land <WH776> of Edom; <WH123> these are the sons <WH1121> of Basemath, <WH1315> Esau <WH6215>'s wife. <WH802>

These are the sons <WH1121> of Oholibamah, <WH173> Esau <WH6215>'s wife: <WH802> chief <WH441> Jeush, <WH3266> chief <WH441> Jalam, <WH3281> chief <WH441> Korah: <WH7141> these are the chiefs <WH441> who came of Oholibamah <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah, <WH6034> Esau <WH6215>'s wife. <WH802>
These are the sons <WH1121> of Esau <WH6215> (that is, <WH123> Edom), and these are their chiefs. <WH441>
These are the sons <WH1121> of Seir <WH8165> the Horite, <WH2752> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land: <WH776> Lotan, <WH3877> Shobal, <WH7732> Zibeon, <WH6649> Anah, <WH6034>
Dishon, <WH1787> Ezer, <WH687> and Dishan. <WH1789> These are the chiefs <WH441> who came of the Horites, <WH2752> the children <WH1121> of Seir <WH8165> in the land <WH776> of Edom. <WH123>
The children <WH1121> of Lotan <WH3877> were Hori <WH2753> and Heman. <WH1967> Lotan <WH3877>'s sister <WH269> was Timna. <WH8555>
These are the children <WH1121> of Shobal: <WH7732> Alvan, <WH5935> Manahath, <WH4506> Ebal, <WH5858> Shepho, <WH8195> and Onam. <WH208>

These are the children <WH1121> of Zibeon: <WH6649> Aiah <WH345> and Anah. <WH6034> This is Anah <WH6034> who found <WH4672> the hot springs <WH3222> in the wilderness, <WH4057> as he fed <WH7462> the donkeys <WH2543> of Zibeon <WH6649> his father. <WH1>
These are the children <WH1121> of Anah: <WH6034> Dishon <WH1787> and Oholibamah, <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah. <WH6034>
These are the children <WH1121> of Dishon: <WH1787> Hemdan, <WH2533> Eshban, <WH790> Ithran, <WH3506> and Cheran. <WH3763>
These are the children <WH1121> of Ezer: <WH687> Bilhan, <WH1092> Zaavan, <WH2190> and Akan. <WH6130>
These are the children <WH1121> of Dishan: <WH1789> Uz <WH5780> and Aran. <WH765>
These are the chiefs <WH441> who came of the Horites: <WH2752> chief <WH441> Lotan, <WH3877> chief <WH441> Shobal, <WH7732> chief <WH441> Zibeon, <WH6649> chief <WH441> Anah, <WH6034>

chief <WH441> Dishon, <WH1787> chief <WH441> Ezer, <WH687> and chief <WH441> Dishan: <WH1789> these are the chiefs <WH441> who came of the Horites, <WH2753> according to their chiefs <WH441> in the land <WH776> of Seir. <WH8165>
These are the kings <WH4428> who reigned <WH4427> in the land <WH776> of Edom, <WH123> before <WH6440> any king <WH4428> reigned <WH4427> over the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
Bela, <WH1106> the son <WH1121> of Beor, <WH1160> reigned <WH4427> in Edom. <WH123> The name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Dinhabah. <WH1838>
Bela <WH1106> died, <WH4191> and Jobab, <WH3103> the son <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226> of Bozrah, <WH1224> reigned in his place. <WH4427>
Jobab <WH3103> died, <WH4191> and Husham <WH2367> of the land <WH776> of the Temanites <WH8489> reigned in his place. <WH4427>

Husham <WH2367> died, <WH4191> and Hadad, <WH1908> the son <WH1121> of Bedad, <WH911> who struck <WH5221> Midian <WH4080> in the field <WH7704> of Moab, <WH4124> reigned <WH4427> in his place. <WH8034> The name of his city <WH5892> was Avith. <WH5762>
Hadad <WH1908> died, <WH4191> and Samlah <WH8072> of Masrekah <WH4957> reigned in his place. <WH4427>
Samlah <WH8072> died, <WH4191> and Shaul <WH7586> of Rehoboth <WH7344> by the river, <WH5104> reigned in his place. <WH4427>
Shaul <WH7586> died, <WH4191> and Baal Hanan, <WH1177> the son <WH1121> of Achbor <WH5907> reigned in his place. <WH4427>

Baal Hanan <WH1177> the son <WH1121> of Achbor <WH5907> died, <WH4191> and Hadar <WH1924> reigned <WH4427> in his place. <WH8034> The name of his city <WH5892> was Pau. <WH6464> His wife <WH802>'s name <WH8034> was Mehetabel, <WH4105> the daughter <WH1323> of Matred, <WH4308> the daughter <WH1323> of Mezahab. <WH4314>

These are the names <WH8034> of the chiefs <WH441> who came from Esau, <WH6215> according to their families, <WH4940> after their places, <WH4725> and by their names: <WH8034> chief <WH441> Timna, <WH8555> chief <WH441> Alvah, <WH5933> chief <WH441> Jetheth, <WH3509>
chief <WH441> Oholibamah, <WH173> chief <WH441> Elah, <WH425> chief <WH441> Pinon, <WH6373>
chief <WH441> Kenaz, <WH7073> chief <WH441> Teman, <WH8487> chief <WH441> Mibzar, <WH4014>

chief <WH441> Magdiel, <WH4025> and chief <WH441> Iram. <WH5902> These are the chiefs <WH441> of Edom, <WH123> according to their habitations <WH4186> in the land <WH776> of their possession. <WH272> This is Esau, <WH6215> the father <WH1> of the Edomites. <WH123>
